title: Scale
description: Begin in Lotus. Place your palms on the floor outside of your hips. Engage your core. Lift your knees slightly, then lift your buttocks from the floor. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Lower with an exhale. Carefully release your legs. Repeat with the other leg on top. Avoid this pose if you have sciatica, knee issues or wrist injury.
